item.title: Steven add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "Whenever you feel like criticizing any one...just remember that all the people in this world haven't had the advantages that you've had." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Steven add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "In my younger and more vulnerable years my father gave me some advice that I've been turning over in my mind ever since." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Steven add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Steven add a quote by Joan Didion
item.description: "Character — the willingness to accept responsibility for one's own life — is the source from which self-respect springs." -- Joan Didion

item.title: Steven add a quote by Joan Didion
item.description: "What makes Iago evil? Some people ask. I never ask." -- Joan Didion

item.title: Steven add a quote by Joan Didion
item.description: "I think we are well advised to keep on nodding terms with the people we used to be, whether we find them attractive company or not. Otherwise they turn up unannounced and surprise us, come hammering on the mind's door at 4 a.m. of a bad night and demand to know who deserted them, who betrayed them, who is going to make amends." -- Joan Didion

item.title: Steven add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "All good books are alike in that they are truer than if they had really happened and after you are finished reading one you will feel that all that happened to you and afterwards it all belongs to you: the good and the bad, the ecstasy, the remorse and sorrow, the people and the places and how the weather was. If you can get so that you can give that to people, then you are a writer." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Steven add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "It's no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn't even speak to each other if they met at a party." -- Nick Hornby
